items.label: 539f6e8dec4f024411ecc387
items.description:
Additional Info:

*AVAILABILITY: Single-phase service under this rate is furnished through one meter for all domestic purposes in single residences or apartments only.  Incidental commercial use (not exceeding 20% of total energy use on the same premises is permitted under this rate.)

*RATE - APPLIED MONTHLY:The rate will be the sum of the Charges as identified below:
**Customer Charge:		$5.00 
**Transmission Charge	$.008500 per kilowatt-hour
**Distribution Charge	$.029004 per kilowatt-hour	
**Capacity Charge	$.061406 per kilowatt-hour
**Energy Charge:		$.021710 per kilowatt-hour

*MINIMUM CHARGE: The minimum bill under this rate will be equal to the Customer Charge.

*PURCHASED POWER ADJUSTMENT: The Purchased Power Adjustment Charge as provided in MDPU Schedule No. 83 is applicable to all kilowatt-hours provided under this rate.

*HOT WATER HEATING CHARGE: If metered separately, to ensure that the energy used does not effect the Department's peak load, all energy so consumed will be charged a discounted Distribution Rate of $.012504 per kilowatt-hour.  All other charges for Hot Water Heating will remain as above.  All equipment installed must be approved by the Department prior to the granting of this rate and remains subject to inspection under this rate.
items.name: DOMESTIC RATE A
